sentences.sContent: I am supposed to drive to and from the grocery store and the doctor’s office (my usual destinations), you bet I am.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am supposed to drive to and from the grocery store and the doctor’s office (my usual destinations), you bet I am.
sentences.sCn: 我必须每天开车在商店和医生的办公室（那是我经常去的地方）来回穿梭吗？ 当然！
